Articles.Content: 0/10 Signature not found.

10/10, quote I wish I'd thought of!

for those asking, my sig references the Novikov self-consistency principle, which states that anything that could cause a temporal paradox (i.e. time travel) is impossible, by virtue of paradoxes being impossible by definition. "All the fun stuff" refers to FTL drives like Alcubierre fields and Krasnikov tubes which, due to their ability to get ahead of a beam of light, can be said to travel in time (create a closed timelike curve, to be exact) and thus may be prohibited by the universe because paradoxes are impossible.

Hopefully some of that made sense?
5/10 I get it now.
7/10 I question your sanity with your obsession of mud.

8/10 that quote keeps getting better.

In my signature, the first quote is just a random one, the second is to show my obsession over the Napoleonic era, the third is a puzzle for you to decipher, the last two are quotes that really make you think.

10/10 The puzzle has got my number.

What letter can "U" possibly represent? It's the first letter of a two letter contraction, which makes me think R or V. But there's a four letter word with it doubled in the middle! Argh!
10/10 have i rated your sig before?
